text: Richard Davalos (November 5, 1930 â€“ March 8, 2016) was an American actor.The New York Times He was known for his roles as Aaon Tusk in East of Eden and as Blind Dick in Cool Hand Luke. He was born in The Bronx, New York. His career began in 1953. He retired in 2008. Davalos died on March 8, 2016 at a hospital in Burbank, California.Cheng, Cheryl. "Richard Davalos Dead" Hollywood Reporter, March 9, 2016 He was aged 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1930 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from the Bronx
title: Richard Davalos
